word:
Elder [Amos] Prescott called upon me. His age is about the same as mine. We had a profitable talk of past, present, and future. We then bowed in prayer and had a most precious, melting season before God.--Ms. 42, 1890, pp. 6, 8 (Diary 16, pp. 227-228, 231). 


                                 -11-
